title: Christian Nielsen (football manager)
text:
Christian Nielsen (born 9 January 1974) is a Danish professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Manager%20%28association%20football%29">manager</a>. He was most recently the manager of <a href="Danish%20Superliga">Danish Superliga</a> club <a href="Lyngby%20Boldklub">Lyngby</a>.
Managerial career.
Nielsen worked in the youth department of <a href="Lyngby%20Boldklub">Lyngby Boldklub</a>, before moving to the youth of <a href="FC%20Nordsj%C3%A6lland">FC Nordsjælland</a> on 1 January 2013. In January 2018, Nielsen returned to the youth academy Lyngby, before he became the <a href="caretaker%20manager">caretaker manager</a> for the first team in the same club in November 2018, after they had fired <a href="Mark%20Strudal">Mark Strudal</a>. At that time, Lyngby was a second-tier <a href="Danish%201st%20Division">1st Division</a> side, and after leading the club to promotion to the <a href="Danish%20Superliga">Superliga</a>, Nielsen was appointed as the permanent new head coach.
